name: Astronaut Escape (Admiralxzero)
description:
Astronaut escape is a simple endless runner game. Run through the cave and survive the onslaught of rocks and aliens coming at you!

Astronaut Escape!

--=--

Play as an astronaut trying to escape a cave filled with flying rocks and dangerous aliens!

--=--

Use space bar to jump! Collect 3 power up token and temporarily become invincible! 

Credits:

Programming and design -  Admiralxzero

Background and Menu art - xVenngeance
